title: Dashboard
content: Your daily control room: today’s focus tasks, active learning progress, recent activity, and quick entry actions.

title: Timeline
content: Vertical life log where you can record key events, decisions, and milestones across work, health, wealth, and personal life.

title: Gallery
content: Local-first gallery for your images and videos with tags, filters, featured items, and lightbox view.

title: Health
content: Health dashboard for daily insulin logs, habits, exercises, and body check snapshots with export and import of your data.

title: Wealth
content: Wealth tracker showing levels, plans, and settings for your long-term savings, interest targets, and milestones.

title: Labs
content: Sandbox area for your builds and experiments, grouped by track, linking finished projects back into GAIA.

title: Archives
content: Root of your study notes and references, grouped by subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind, Git & CLI, React, Next.js, and Node.js.

title: ELEUTHIA · Vault & Backups
content: Zero-knowledge vault that stores encrypted secrets and backups; the single home for safety, passwords, and snapshots.

title: Classic · Site Map
content: Manual overview of GAIA pages and sections so you can visually navigate the whole OS structure.

title: Classic · Directory
content: Developer-friendly directory listing of routes and files inside GAIA, useful for debugging and orientation.

title: Classic · What’s New
content: Changelog-style feed where you can see the latest additions and tweaks to GAIA across versions.

title: Classic · Announcements
content: Bulletin page for personal notes, announcements, and bigger shifts in GAIA’s roadmap or behavior.

title: Classic · Download Center
content: Central place to keep downloadable zips, backups, exports, and other files related to GAIA.

title: Settings
content: Per-user settings for GAIA, including theme selection and the default button and search bar styles.

title: TODO · All Tasks
content: Full view of your daily tasks grouped by Life, Work, and Distraction categories; synced with the dashboard focus panel.

title: Apollo · Archives & Ask
content: Space for deep research, long-form notes, and transcripts, where you can review material and later feed it into Academy.

title: Archives · HTML
content: Semantic HTML, forms, and media elements. This is the base layer for everything else you build. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · CSS
content: Styling, layout, and responsive behavior. The goal is clean, predictable styles instead of chaos. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · JavaScript
content: Core language features, DOM manipulation, and browser APIs for interactive behavior. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · Tailwind CSS
content: Utility-first CSS with Tailwind for fast iteration using classes instead of huge CSS files. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · Git & CLI
content: Version control with Git and comfort in the command line as the safety net for GAIA changes. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · React
content: Component-based UI for GAIA’s interactive pieces like Dashboard, Health, Wealth, and Gallery. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · Next.js
content: Full-stack React with Next.js App Router, data fetching, and routing. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: Archives · Node.js
content: Server-side JavaScript runtime for scripts, tooling, and any future GAIA services. This subject also feeds concepts into the Academy skill tree.

title: GAIA Intro
content: Landing view for GAIA as your personal operating system, from which you can jump to the dashboard, archives, gallery, health, and wealth.
